root.cn:
针对一岁以上小孩设计,以有趣和逐渐具有挑战性方式发展孩子的动作技能,视觉技能和认知能力,特别适合幼儿和儿童.为孩子们提供各种不同的交通工具. 有汽车,飞机,轮船,自行车,摩托车,火箭,火车,太阳,月亮等等。
我们的特色： 1.提供几十种好玩的超高清交通工具与七种色彩鲜艳生动的场景！ 2.拼图难度会逐级增加，从4块到9块,更加锻炼孩子的识别能力! 3.配有英文版的交通工具单词和发音，是一个有趣的方法来培养宝宝的逻辑思维和学习单词的方式！
通过改软件将帮助您的孩子增进以下几个方面的能力: 1.问题解决的能力 2.逻辑与认知能力 3.专心和注意力 4.记忆力 5.语言技能(学习简单英文词汇和发音)
root.en: This software is designed for children education over a year old, with interesting and challenging skill of gradual development of children, visual skills and cognitive ability, especially suitable for infants and children. To provide a variety of transportation for children. There is a car, airplane, ship, bicycle, motorcycle, rocket, train, sun the moon and so on. Our characteristics: 1 to provide dozens of fun Ultra HD transport and seven kinds of colorful vivid scenes! 2 puzzle will gradually increase the difficulty, from 4 to 9, more exercise the child's ability to recognize! 3 with the English version of the traffic tools word and pronunciation, is an interesting way to cultivate children's logical thinking and learning the word! By changing the software will help your child improve the following aspects of the ability: 1 problem solving skills 2 logic and cognitive ability 3 concentration and attention 4 memory 5 language skills (learn simple English vocabulary and pronunciation)
